# [Interview #949: AMOL Signing Report - Viper, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=949#11)

#### Viper

Hoid has a nugget of Lerasium and the Moon Scepter. Does he have a Breath?

#### Brandon Sanderson

It seems quite likely that he would.
